name: Color Shooter (min4899)
description:
A pixel-art, arcade shoot 'em up with color switching mechanics!

Color Shooter is a casual, shoot 'em up game that involves absorbing and shooting different colors to blast away enemies. The web demo above contains the tutorial/1st level and the 2nd level. The downloadable versions currently have 12 unique levels, each introducing new enemies or concepts.

The player can only destroy red, yellow, or green enemies by shooting with the corresponding color. However, the player can only switch colors by absorbing enemies or projectiles of a different color while the shield is up. The player must carefully select which colors to absorb while destroying swarms of enemies.

Controls (Keyboard or Mouse): 

Keyboard'WASD' or 'Arrow Keys' for movement.
'Left Shift' to slow down movement.
MouseClick and Hold to move the ship. The ship will quickly move towards any location you click on.

The game is currently in early development. New contents, levels, and updates may be added soon.
